title: Iron ore price: impact of coronavirus worldwide 2019-2020 | Statista
author: M Garside; Jun
description: The 2020 coronavirus (Covid-19) pandemic has had a noteworthy impact on commodities prices, including metals such as iron ore.
cleaned_text: Impact of Covid-19 on global iron ore price 2019-2020 [The 2020 coronavirus (Covid-19) pandemic has had a noteworthy impact on commodities prices, including metals such as iron ore. The impact of Covid-19 on the global iron ore industry is apparent from the decline in the average year-to-date price of iron ore as of May 2020 (83.50 U.S. dollars per metric ton) as compared to the average price in 2019 (90.40 U.S. dollars per metric ton).
